comments.raw_text:
In his tech talk (http://livestre.am/zhts, 53:15m), jasone explains that GLIBCXX_FORCE_NEW can cause glibc to be slow when using the STL.

We should try this, with the following caveats:
 - this might only apply to the latest jemalloc
 - I'm not even sure if we use the STL in Firefox

I think it's probably safe to turn it on if jemalloc is on, even on platforms that don't use glibc.
